title: Alibaba lures older shoppers as market slows
text:
Alibaba lures older shoppers as market slows 3:42pm GMT - 01:36 
China's e-commerce giant Alibaba is looking to tap older shoppers as broader growth in online retail revenues slows, with a spending spree to set up physical stores and with the launch of an ''elderly friendly'' version of its shopping app Taobao. Grace Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
China's e-commerce giant Alibaba is looking to tap older shoppers as broader growth in online retail revenues slows, with a spending spree to set up physical stores and with the launch of an "elderly friendly" version of its shopping app Taobao.
